attributes.action: Cease all military and financial aid to Ukraine.
attributes.additional_details: The financial burden of ongoing military and financial support is weighing heavily on taxpayers. With the UK facing rising domestic challenges, including a cost-of-living crisis, many believe the government should prioritise national welfare over foreign involvement. Furthermore, this continued support could deepen the UK's involvement in a conflict that risks spiralling into a larger international crisis, making diplomacy and peace efforts more difficult.
attributes.background: We call on the UK government to immediately cease all military and financial aid to Ukraine, and to re-evaluate its foreign policy to prioritise peaceful, diplomatic solutions to international conflicts.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for similar action:

Stop sending military aid to Ukraine
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/702525

Don't send troops to Ukraine to support peacekeeping
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/705814

Hold a referendum on continued UK support for Ukraine
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/702489
